title: FOR THOSE WITH FALLOUT 4 ISSUES, PLEASE ENTER, PSA
body:
If your game crashes immediately, no warning, right as you hit play do these things to fix it:

when you bring up the fallout 4 option menu, click options. select windowed and borderless. try to fit your graphics as best to the screen as possible, though the game will look wonky, it will at least let you play.
